Newsbrief: Detroit: Become Human has surpassed 15 million sales worldwide to cement its position as Quantic Dream's best-selling title to date.

The French studio shared the news on LinkedIn and said the milestone reflects the dedication of its development team. 

The sci-fi adventure launched in 2018 for PlayStation 4 before eventually debuting on Windows PC in 2019.

About the Author

Game Developer news editor Chris Kerr is an award-winning reporter with over a decade of experience in the game industry. Throughout his career, Chris has covered major industry events including GDC, PAX Australia, Gamescom, Paris Games Week, and Develop Brighton.
